entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is introduced as the one who made a deep grunt. He is described as being to Harry's right.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is introduced as staring back at Harry out of dull, deep-set eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as unlocking his door and stepping in front of a cracked mirror.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as opening his door and staring at Harry. He is described as looking pale and shocked.

relationships.description: Harry and Crabbe are in close proximity to each other, with Crabbe being to Harry's right.
Harry and Goyle both scratch their ears.
Harry and Ron stare at each other when Ron opens his door.
